foreignData.name: Runadi, Behemothrufer
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn du einen Kreaturenzauber mit Manabetrag 5 oder mehr wirkst, kommt die Kreatur mit X zusätzlichen +1/+1-Marken ins Spiel, wobei X gleich ihrem Manabetrag minus 4 ist.
Kreaturen mit drei oder mehr +1/+1-Marken, die du kontrollierst, haben Eile.
{T}: Erzeuge {G}.

foreignData.name: Runadi, llamabehemots
foreignData.text:
Siempre que lances un hechizo de criatura con valor de maná de 5 o más, esa criatura entra al campo de batalla con X contadores +1/+1 adicionales sobre ella, donde X es su valor de maná menos 4.
Las criaturas que controlas con tres o más contadores +1/+1 sobre ellas tienen la habilidad de prisa.
{T}: Agrega {G}.

foreignData.name: Runadi, meneur de béhémoths
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort de créature avec une valeur de mana supérieure ou égale à 5, cette créature arrive sur le champ de bataille avec X marqueurs +1/+1 supplémentaires sur elle, X étant sa valeur de mana moins 4.
Les créatures que vous contrôlez avec au moins trois marqueurs +1/+1 sur elles ont la célérité.
{T} : Ajoutez {G}.

foreignData.name: Runadi, Evocatore di Behemoth
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia creatura con valore di mana pari o superiore a 5, quella creatura entra nel campo di battaglia con X segnalini +1/+1 addizionali, dove X è il suo valore di mana meno 4.
Le creature con tre o più segnalini +1/+1 che controlli hanno rapidità.
{T}: Aggiungi {G}.

mainBoard.name: Engulfing Slagwurm
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

rulings.text: As each ability resolves, the amount of life you gain is equal to the appropriate creature’s current toughness (if it’s somehow still on the battlefield), or its toughness as it last existed on the battlefield (in all other cases).
Engulfing Slagwurm’s ability triggers and resolves during the declare blockers step. Creatures destroyed this way will not deal combat damage.

Even if the ability of an attacking Engulfing Slagwurm destroys each creature blocking it, Engulfing Slagwurm won’t deal combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking unless it somehow gains trample.

If Engulfing Slagwurm’s ability resolves and the other creature is not destroyed (perhaps because it has already left the battlefield or it regenerates), you’ll still gain life equal to that creature’s toughness.

If your Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by multiple creatures, its ability triggers that many times. Each trigger will be associated with a specific creature. You choose which order to have the abilities resolve.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

mainBoard.name: Enlarge
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able.

rulings.text: If each creature the defending player controls can't block for any reason (such as being tapped), then the affected creature isn't blocked. If there's a cost associated with blocking the affected creature, the defending player isn't forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to be blocked in that case either.
Only one creature is required to block the affected creature. Other creatures may also block it and are free to block other creatures or not block at all.

mainBoard.text: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

"Non vedi invecchiare molti cacciatori di lupi mannari."
—Paulin, trappolatore di Somberwald
foreignData.name: Predare
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio che controlli lotta con una creatura bersaglio che non controlli. (Ogni creatura infligge all'altra danno pari alla propria forza.)

foreignData.flavorText:
「年取った人狼狩りはほとんどいないよ。」
――ソンバーワルドの罠師、パーリン
foreignData.name: 捕食
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体とあなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者と格闘を行う。（それぞれはもう一方に自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。）

foreignData.flavorText:
「你不会见到太多年老的狼人猎手。」
～松柏森布陷人堡霖
foreignData.name: 捕食
foreignData.text: 目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）

mainBoard.name: Prey Upon
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

rulings.text: If either target is an illegal target as Prey Upon resolves, no creature will deal or be dealt damage.

mainBoard.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

foreignData.name: Gabe der Gargantuas
foreignData.text: Schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst eine Kreaturenkarte und/oder eine Länderkarte davon offen vorzeigen und die vorgezeigten Karten auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Regalo de las gargantúas
foreignData.text: Mira las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de criatura y/o una carta de tierra de entre ellas y poner las cartas mostradas en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreignData.name: Don du gargantuesque
foreignData.text: Regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de créature et/ou une carte de terrain parmi elles et mettre les cartes révélées dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignData.name: Dono del Mastodonte
foreignData.text: Guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta creatura e/o una carta terra scelte tra esse e aggiungere alla tua mano le carte rivelate. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignData.name: ガルガンチュアンの贈り物
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード４枚を見る。あなたは「その中からクリーチャー・カード最大１枚と土地・カード最大１枚を公開し、あなたの手札に加える。」を選んでもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignData.name: 巨兽赋礼
foreignData.text: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中一张生物牌和／或一张地牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

mainBoard.name: Gift of the Gargantuan
mainBoard.originalText: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card and/or a land card from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: If one of the cards is Dryad Arbor (a creature land card), you may reveal Dryad Arbor and another land card or Dryad Arbor and another creature card.
You may reveal a creature card, or you may reveal a land card, or you may reveal both a creature card and a land card.

mainBoard.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card and/or a land card from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Let the forest spread! From salt, stone, and fen, let the new trees rise."
—Molimo, maro-sorcerer

foreignData.flavorText:
„Möge sich der Wald ausbreiten! Aus Salz, aus Stein und aus Morast sollen neue Bäume emporsprießen."
—Molimo, Maro-Hexer
foreignData.name: Übermäßiges Wachstum
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert ein Land
Immer wenn das verzauberte Land für Mana getappt wird, erzeugt sein Beherrscher zusätzlich {G}{G}.

foreignData.flavorText:
"¡Deja que el bosque se extienda! Deja que se alcen los nuevos árboles de entre la sal, las rocas y las ciénagas".
—Molimo, hechicero maro
foreignData.name: Crecimiento desmedido
foreignData.text:
Encantar tierra.
Siempre que se gire la tierra encantada para obtener maná, su controlador agrega {G}{G} adicionales.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Laissez la forêt s'épanouir ! Que les jeunes arbrisseaux jaillissent du sel, de la roche et des marais. »
—Molimo, maro-sorcier
foreignData.name: Luxuriance
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : terrain
À chaque fois que le terrain enchanté est engagé pour du mana, son contrôleur ajoute {G}{G} supplémentaires.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Che la foresta si allarghi! Che i nuovi alberi nascano dal sale, dalla pietra e dalla palude."
—Molimo, stregone maro
foreignData.name: Vegetazione Rigogliosa
foreignData.text:
Incanta terra
Ogniqualvolta la terra incantata viene TAPpata per attingere mana, il suo controllore aggiunge {G}{G} addizionale.

foreignData.flavorText:
「森よ広がれ！塩から、石から、沼から、新たな樹よ立つがいい。」
――マローの魔術師モリモ
foreignData.name: はびこり
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（土地）
エンチャントしている土地がマナを引き出す目的でタップされるたび、それのコントローラーは追加で{G}{G}を加える。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText:
「就让树林蔓延！不论盐地，枯石，沼泽，都会挺立起树苗。」
～玛洛术士莫黎墨
foreignData.name: 过度生长
foreignData.text:
结附于地
每当横置所结附的地以产生法术力时，其操控者额外加{G}{G}。

mainBoard.name: Overgrowth
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}{G}.

rulings.text: This is a triggered mana ability.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}{G}.

mainBoard.flavorText: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.

foreignData.flavorText: Menschlichen Blicken entzogen, schwirren Vögel in einem verborgenen Paradies zwischen farbenfrohen Blüten umher.
foreignData.name: Gedeihender Hain
foreignData.text:
Der Gedeihende Hain kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie der Gedeihende Hain ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Grün.
{T}: Erzeuge {G} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Lejos de la mirada de los humanos, los pájaros revolotean entre flores en un paraíso oculto.
foreignData.name: Arboleda floreciente
foreignData.text:
La Arboleda floreciente entra al campo de batalla girada.
En cuanto la Arboleda floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea verde.
{T}: Agrega {G} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: À l'abri des regards humains, les oiseaux papillonnent entre les fleurs luxuriantes d'un paradis caché.
foreignData.name: Bosquet prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Bosquet prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Bosquet prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le vert.
{T} : Ajoutez {G} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Al riparo da occhi umani, gli uccellini guizzano tra boccioli dai colori vivaci in un paradiso nascosto.
foreignData.name: Boschetto Florido
foreignData.text:
Il Boschetto Florido entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
Mentre il Boschetto Florido entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal verde.
{T}: Aggiungi {G} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 人の目に触れないこの知られざる楽園で、鳥たちは鮮やかな花々の間を飛び交っている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する木立
foreignData.text:
興隆する木立はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する木立が戦場に出るに際し、緑でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{G}か、その選ばれた色１色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 人类视界之外还有一片隐蔽乐土，此处鸟语花香，绿意盎然。
foreignData.name: 兴旺树丛
foreignData.text:
兴旺树丛须横置进战场。
于兴旺树丛进战场时，选择一种绿色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{G}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Grove
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Grove enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Grove enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
